title: Balance sheets - Banks A B C - which is true

content.question: Based on the balance sheets above for three different banks, which of the following is true, if the reserve requirement is 10 percent?

choices.label: Bank A has no excess reserves.
Bank B has no excess reserves.
Bank B can increase its loans by $500.
Bank B can increase its loans by $40.

content.answer: Bank B can increase its loans by $40.

topic.text: 4.4: Banking and the Expansion of the Money Supply

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
